statements: SELECT * FROM SoilCompositionData ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT sample_id, location_name, soil_ph FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE soil_ph > 6.5;
SELECT location_name, nutrient_type, nutrient_level FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE nutrient_type = 'Nitrogen';
SELECT * FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE soil_ph < 5.0 AND nutrient_level > 3.0 ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, nutrient_type, nutrient_level, soil_ph FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE sample_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT sample_id, location_name, nutrient_type, nutrient_level, soil_ph FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE soil_ph > 6.5 ORDER BY nutrient_level DESC, location_name ASC
SELECT location_name, AVG(nutrient_level) AS avg_nutrient_level FROM SoilCompositionData GROUP BY location_name HAVING avg_nutrient_level > 5.0 ORDER BY avg_nutrient_level DESC
SELECT * FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE nutrient_type = 'Nitrogen' AND nutrient_level BETWEEN 2.0 AND 5.0 ORDER BY sample_id ASC
SELECT MAX(soil_ph) AS max_soil_ph, MIN(soil_ph) AS min_soil_ph FROM SoilCompositionData
SELECT sample_id, location_name, nutrient_type, nutrient_level, soil_ph FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE nutrient_level < 3.0 AND soil_ph < 5.5 ORDER BY sample_id DESC
SELECT * FROM SoilCompositionData;
SELECT location, pH_level FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE pH_level > 5.5;
SELECT soil_id, nutrient_levels FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE location = 'Farm A';
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT soil_id, health_rating FROM SoilHealthAnalysis WHERE health_rating < 8.0;
SELECT * FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE pH_level > 6.5 ORDER BY soil_id ASC
SELECT location, nutrient_levels->>'nitrogen' AS nitrogen_level FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE location LIKE 'Garden%'
SELECT soil_id, location, pH_level, nutrient_levels FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE location = 'Farm' ORDER BY pH_level DESC

SELECT soil_id, analysis_date, health_rating FROM SoilHealthAnalysis JOIN SoilCompositionData ON SoilHealthAnalysis.soil_id = SoilCompositionData.soil_id WHERE health_rating > 8.0 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT analysis_id, soil_id, analysis_date, health_rating FROM SoilHealthAnalysis WHERE soil_id = 3 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
SELECT id, sample_date, location FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT id, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level, potassium_level FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM NutrientLevels WHERE value > 10;
SELECT nutrient_name, value, unit FROM NutrientLevels WHERE nutrient_name = 'Nitrogen';
SELECT sample_id, health_rating, comments FROM SoilHealth WHERE health_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE nitrogen_level > 3 AND phosphorus_level < 1.5;
SELECT location, sample_date FROM SoilSamples WHERE location = 'Farm A';
SELECT sample_id, nutrient_name, value FROM NutrientLevels ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealth WHERE health_rating >= 3 AND comments LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT sample_id, SUM(value) AS total_nutrient FROM NutrientLevels GROUP BY sample_id;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT location, date_collected, pH FROM soil_samples WHERE pH > 7.0;
SELECT * FROM nutrient_analysis WHERE nitrate < phosphate;
SELECT location, nutrient_levels->>'nitrogen' AS nitrogen_level FROM soil_samples;
SELECT location, trend_description FROM soil_trends WHERE trend_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM soil_samples;
SELECT location, date_collected FROM soil_samples ORDER BY date_collected DESC;
SELECT * FROM nutrient_analysis WHERE nitrate > 10 AND phosphate < 5;
SELECT location, nutrient_levels FROM soil_samples WHERE pH >= 6 AND pH <= 7;
SELECT health_id, organic_matter FROM soil_health WHERE organic_matter IS NOT NULL ORDER BY health_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples WHERE ph_level > 6.5;
SELECT location, date_sampled FROM SoilSamples WHERE nitrogen_level < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM NutrientLevels WHERE phosphorus > 2.0 AND calcium < 1.0;
SELECT sample_id, organic_matter, compaction FROM SoilHealth WHERE microbial_activity > 4.0;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherConditions WHERE precipitation > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples ORDER BY date_sampled DESC, ph_level ASC
SELECT location, nitrogen_level FROM SoilSamples WHERE ph_level > 6 ORDER BY nitrogen_level DESC
SELECT location, date_sampled FROM SoilSamples JOIN SoilComposition ON SoilSamples.sample_id = SoilComposition.sample_id WHERE sand_percent < 40
SELECT location, nitrogen_level, phosphorus, calcium FROM SoilSamples JOIN NutrientLevels ON SoilSamples.sample_id = NutrientLevels.sample_id WHERE phosphorus > 5 AND calcium < 3
SELECT silt_percent, clay_percent FROM SoilComposition WHERE sample_id = (SELECT sample_id FROM SoilSamples WHERE location = 'Farm A')
